member.name: P:UnicodeToSqLite.Program.Options.MaxCharValue
member.summary: The maximum number of element to read from xml and write to database. Default value is 65535

member.name: P:UnicodeToSqLite.Program.Options.ProcessRepertoireXml
member.summary: If true then Repertoire items will be processed and written into Database. Default is true.

member.name: P:UnicodeToSqLite.Program.Options.ProcessBlocksXml
member.summary: If true then Block items will be processed and written into the database. Default is true.

member.name: P:UnicodeToSqLite.Program.Options.ProcessNamedSequences
member.summary: If true then Named Sequences items will be processed and written into the database. Default is true.

member.name: P:UnicodeToSqLite.Program.Options.ProcessNormalizationCorrections
member.summary: If true then Normalization Corrections items will be processed and written into the database. Default is true.

member.name: P:UnicodeToSqLite.Program.Options.ProcesStandardizedVariants
member.summary: If true then Standardized Variants items will be processed and written into the database. Default is true.

member.name: P:UnicodeToSqLite.Program.Options.ProcessCjkRadicals
member.summary: If true then Cjk Radicals items will be processed and written into the database. Default is true.

member.name: P:UnicodeToSqLite.Program.Options.ProcessEmojiSource
member.summary: If true then Emoji Source items will be processed and written into the database. Default is true.

member.name: P:UnicodeToSqLite.Program.Options.CreatePlanes
member.summary: If true then Emoji Source items will be processed and written into the database. Default is true.
